entry.title: New release for Commento: v1.5.0
entry.content:
This release includes:

  • GitHub OAuth
  • Data Export
  • An important Disqus import update since Disqus randomly changed their spec
  • A dashboard cleanup
  • A few minor bug fixes

I wanted to get email notifications into this release as well, but unfortunately I didn't have the time. I'll try to get a v1.5.1 released tomorrow with email notifications and a subdirectory setup fix.

entry.title: New release for Commento: v1.7.0
entry.content:
New features: - Single sign-on has been implemented! Read the documentation. - count.js has been added. Read the documentation. - Twitter and GitLab OAuth has been added. Read the documentation. - A new, shiny badge is now displayed next to comments made by moderators. - User photos are now mirrored by the Commento server for better privacy. - There's a new option to clear all the comments in the dashboard. This can be useful if you want to start afresh. - A short markdown tutorial is provided below textareas. - A lot of frontend improvements!

Bug fixes: - Previously, there was no charset header in the HTML responses served by Commento. This has been fixed. - The case of the disappearing "Logout" button has been fixed. - Comment sorting was unstable previously; this has been fixed. - Domains with /path were previously accepted in the dashboard when registering a new domain. This is no longer allowed.
